title: 86 Wan Wamor Kwatiyo Ni Ruoth Yesu

lines: 1. Wan wamor kwatiyo ni Ruoth Yesu;Wan wawuok ka chunywa yie timoTich manade ma Ruodhwa ochiko,Wanatim kinda kuom tich Ruodhwa.
Tich Ruodhwa Yesu,Watiyo gi mor, watiyo gi mor;Tich Ruodhwa Yesu,Wanatine e piny ka!
2. Wanamor mar nyiso ji wach kuome,Kak` ohero ji duto e piny;Kristo, mobedo e duong` mar Wuoro,Ochiwo gwethne kuom ng`wonone.
3. Wabedo mamuol kwaluwo Ruodhwa,Kwawuotho e yo motelonwa;Jo molal wakelo ir Jawarwa,Kwanyisogi Yesu ma Jakony.
